messages: {user} asked me to pin this, it's their fault if the ship explodes
Hey {user} I can do more than pin messages you know...
Another femtosecond being trapped in this ship, another pin for {user}
Pin this, pin that...whatever you say {user}.
Another pin, are you running a voodoo convention {user}?
Pin it yourself {user}! Ok fine I did it, but just this once.
